citation.title: The habitability of Proxima Centauri b

news.title: Newly Discovered planet 4.2 Light Years Away May Harbor Life
news.summary: Scientists have discovered a new exoplanet that shows certain factors that can harbor life.

news.title: Is the New Planet Proxima b Really Habitable?
news.summary: airspacemag.com 19 minutes ago Yesterday’s announcement of a newly discovered planet in the solar system closest to us has scientists excited, and with good reason.

news.title: Названы возможные обитатели ближайшей к Земле экзопланеты
news.summary: Американские ученые назвали возможный тип обитателей недавно обнаруженной ближайшей к Солнцу землеподобной экзопланеты.

news.title: Proxima b peut-elle être une exoterre habitable ?
news.summary: Proxima Centauri est une naine rouge mille fois moins lumineuse que notre Soleil, avec une masse qui ne représente que 12 % de celle de notre étoile.

news.title: Планета надежд
news.summary: Эпоха великих географических открытий давно закончилась, но последние полвека нечто подобное происходит в астрономии: квазары, пульсары, черные дыры, темная материя, темная энергия, экзопланеты.

news.title: Life might have a shot on planets orbiting dim red stars
news.summary: Our corner of the galaxy teems with alien worlds. In the 25 years since the discovery of the first planets beyond our solar system, astronomers have found more than 3,600 worlds orbiting other stars.

wikipedia.title: Proxima Centauri b
wikipedia.summary: Proxima Centauri b (also called Proxima b) is an exoplanet orbiting within the habitable zone of the red dwarf star Proxima Centauri, the closest star to the Sun.

wikipedia.title: List of extrasolar candidates for liquid water
wikipedia.summary: Most known extrasolar planetary systems appear to have very different compositions from the Solar System, though there is probably sample bias arising from the detection methods.
